article_title: Rich political traditions mark Executive Council race
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: In their campaigns to represent District 3 on the governor’s Executive Council, Chris Sununu of Newfields and Robin McLane of Portsmouth have at least one thing in common: They both come from families with deep political roots.Sununu, the incumbent Republican, is the son of John H. Sununu, former New Hampshire governor, White House chief of staff, and chairman of the New Hampshire Republican Party. His brother, John E. Sununu, was a three-term representative from the state’s 1st
article_metadata.author: Paul Briand news@seacoastonline.com
